Sharon

 

Sharon Dauskardt
MARKETING COORDINATOR
Alain Pinel Realtors® Los Altos and Woodside
C 650.704.1865 | D 650.941.1111 x465
apr.com

 

From: Cindy Posnanski
Sent: Friday, May 04, 2018 4:59 PM
To: Sharon Dauskardt
Subject: Fwd: Automatic reply: Open House in Santa Clara

 

Hi Sharon, 

 

I got Out Of Office messages from people in other offices, but I didn’t receive it and  checked with a couple of other agents.  Do you usually not send this email our office?

 

 

Cindy M. Posnanski 

Real Estate Professional

Los Altos, CA 94122

Alain Pinel Realtors ®, Los Altos
C 650.485.9286 | O 650.941.1111

cposnanski@apr.com

tickets.subject: FW: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)
tickets.description:
Can you help me with the error message below?  I have a potential recruit that gets keeps getting blocked when he tries to e-mail me.  He contacted Jan Jaramillo to notify me.  Is this something that can be fixed in mimecast or is it on the senders side?

 

Please advise.  Thank you.

 

Peter F. Aiello
   Vice President/Managing Broker
  Lic# 00771026

“For the real estate experience”
   Alain Pinel Realtors®  San Mateo
  www.apr.com (http://www.apr.com/)       Join Our Team (http://bit.ly/2w78RZ5)

Search Property Listings Here (http://mobileapp.apr.com/APRPFAIELLO)

I have not and will not verify information supplied by third parties.

This email communication contains CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION WHICH ALSO MAY BE LEGALLY PRIVILEGED and is intended only for the use of the recipients identified above. The information may also be protected by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act 18 USC §§ 2510-2521. If you are not the intended recipient of this communication, you are hereby notified that any unauthorized review, use, dissemination, distribution, downloading, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient and have received this communication in error, please immediately notify us by reply email, delete the communication and destroy all copies.

 

 

 

 

 

From: Fadi Shamieh [mailto:shamiehfadi@gmail.com]
Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2018 3:05 PM
To: Jan Jaramillo
Subject: Fwd: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)

 

Hi Jan,

 

Im sorry to keep bothering you but you are my only contact in that office.

 

I keep getting this message (see below) when I send Peter an email.

 

Thanks

Fadi

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Mail Delivery Subsystem <mailer-daemon@googlemail.com>
Date: Thu, May 3, 2018 at 3:02 PM
Subject: Delivery Status Notification (Failure)
To: shamiehfadi@gmail.com

Message blocked

Your message to paiello@apr.com has been blocked. See technical details below for more information.

LEARN MORE (https://community.mimecast.com/docs/DOC-1369#550)

This link will take you to a third-party site

The response was:

550 Envelope blocked - User Domain Entry - https://community.mimecast.com/docs/DOC-1369#550 (https://community.mimecast.com/docs/DOC-1369#550)


Final-Recipient: rfc822; paiello@apr.com
Action: failed
Status: 5.0.0
Remote-MTA: dns; us-smtp-inbound-2.mimecast.com (http://us-smtp-inbound-2.mimecast.com) . (205.139.110.141, the server
 for the domain apr.com (http://apr.com) .)
Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 550 Envelope blocked - User Domain Entry - https://community.mimecast.com/docs/DOC-1369#550
Last-Attempt-Date (https://community.mimecast.com/docs/DOC-1369#550Last-Attempt-Date) : Thu, 03 May 2018 15:02:49 -0700 (PDT)


---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Fadi Shamieh <shamiehfadi@gmail.com>
To: Peter Aiello <paiello@apr.com>
Cc: 
Bcc: 
Date: Thu, 3 May 2018 15:02:48 -0700
Subject: Re: Sorry I did not receive your follow up e-mail

Hello Peter,

 

Next Tuesday works for me.  What time would you like for me to come in?

 

Thank You

Fadi Shamieh

 

On Thu, May 3, 2018 at 11:47 AM, Peter Aiello <paiello@apr.com> wrote:

Hello Fadi,

 

My sincere apologies for not responding to your follow up e-mail.   Jan Jaramillo had notified me and I don’t understand why I didn’t receive them.  If you haven’t made your decision yet, I’d be happy to meet with you Friday, next Monday or Tuesday.

 

Thank you.

 

<s ----- Message truncated -----

tickets.subject: The Print Spooler service keeps stopping on this APR desktop.
tickets.raw_subject: The Print Spooler service keeps stopping on this APR desktop.
tickets.description:
Aris Markoulis’ APR desktop has a re-occurring problem where the Print Spooler service stops. This prevents any printing from working. This happens 2-3 times a week. Restarting the service fixes the issue temporarily but it stops again.

 

The computer name is: bg1-41qsk

 

-Franco

 

 

Patricia Dwyer

Alain Pinel Realtors | CalBRE# 01281150

1440 Chapin Ave Ste 200 |Burlingame, CA 94010

650.931.2035  Office

650.703.1183  Direct

PDwyer@apr.com

tickets.subject: New for May: No more paused Zaps, 31 new apps, and the best landing page builders
tickets.raw_subject: New for May: No more paused Zaps, 31 new apps, and the best landing page builders
tickets.description:
Introducing Held Tasks: We no longer pause or turn off Zaps when errors occur—preventing you from losing any data.

THE ZAPIER MONTHLY: May 2018

Introducing Held Tasks:

Your Zaps Will No Longer Be Paused

Hey Apr Support!

Accidents happen. But they shouldn't stop you from getting your most important data where it needs to go.

Today we're excited to announce that Zapier will no longer pause your Zaps when they hit a plan limit or other roadblocks. Instead, we'll hold onto your Tasks and help you automate them when the problem is resolved—preventing any lost data.

Check out our full announcement for all the details

Learn About the Hold Up

 

Steal This Workflow

How a Family Business Cut Out 90% of Time Spent on Manual Work

We love entrepreneurs—especially family businesses. It's even better when we're able to help them grow. Which is why we were excited to peek behind the scenes to see how this eCommerce store manages their newsletter list and tracks sales with a boost of automation.

Learn the workflows they use to remove over 90% of manual tasks

Automation for the Whole Family

 

The 10 Best Landing Page Tools for 2018

Landing pages are important for any marketer. We tested over 30 different tools to bring you this list of our favorites.

See Who Made the List

 

The 5 Best Alternatives to Google URL Shortener

Google's URL Shortener is riding into the sunset. So we compiled our list of the best alternatives to make easily shared URLs.

Pour One Out for Goo.gl

 

Our Google Tasks Guide: Build a Productive & Simple To-Do List Workflow

Google Tasks is one of the most popular to-do list apps due to its simplicity. With its recent redesign and new features, we take a look at how you can use it to boost your productivity.

Take Your To-Do List to Task

 

Everything You Need to Know About the New Gmail

In case you missed it, Google gave Gmail a much needed update—adding new features and a fresh coat of paint. Here's everything you need to know and how to enable the new features.

Get Excited About Email

 

31 New Integrations + 19 Updates

Everything We Added in April

In April, we added 31 new integrations to Zapier and updated 19 others—including Leadpages, Things, Google Calendar, and Evernote.

Featured Integrations

Leadpages   NEW!

Build beautiful, high-converting landing pages, sign-up forms, and other conversion assets.

Deal Alert: Leadpages is giving Zapier customers 75% off annual plans until May 31

Things   NEW!

Award-winning personal task manager for Mac and iOS that helps you achieve your goals.

Google Calendar   UPDATED!

Support for triggering Zaps when an event is canceled or deleted.

Evernote   UPDATED!

Support for using tags on notes to trigger a Zap.

Review All the New Updates

 

ARTICLES FROM THE ZAPIER COMMUNITY

7 Simple Automations to Get More Done Every Day

RescueTime

The Top 5 Ways Event Creators Save Time With App Automation

Eventbrite

Build Smarter Workflows to Boost Productivity Without Hiring an Assistant

Calendly

How an Education Business Automates Their Certifications With Webmerge

WebMerge

Looking for more posts from the Zapier community?

We've Got You Covered

 

We're Hiring!

Come Join Our Remote Team

Our team of 125+ works from all around the world. You can, too!

tickets.subject: [Mimecast] Messages on hold for missupport@apr.com
tickets.description:
Mimecast - Messages On Hold

The following messages, addressed to you, are currently on hold within 	the Mimecast service awaiting further action.

To edit multiple messages at the same time, log in to 	mimecast.apr.com (https://mimecast.apr.com/) , 	click the Advanced Menu, then click "Personal On Hold".

For further instructions on how to use the links associated with 	each email, please review the following points:

* Release: Releases the message to your Inbox (future emails from this sender will still be placed On Hold)
* Block: Rejects the email, and blocks future emails from this sender
* Permit: Delivers the email to your Inbox and ensures future emails from this sender are not held.

For more information on the Mimecast digest, please refer to this 	article (http://kb.mimecast.com/Mimecast_Knowledge_Base/Administration_Console/Gateway/Policies/Digest_Sets) .

From Subject Release Block Allow
